sources.note: Main website. Describes CareTracker as all-in-one cloud-based EHR + PM + RCM for ambulatory practices. Lists specialties, key features, 600+ integrations, 20+ years serving thousands of providers.

ONC certification details, version 9, certified July 2018. Lists third-party dependencies (Surescripts, DrFirst, Iron Bridge, EMR Direct) and bundled content (Krames, IMO, Crystal Reporting, Medicomp Medcin, Medi-Span). Discloses additional fees for ePrescribing, lab interfaces, registry interfaces.
EHR feature page. Describes ambient listening/voice dictation, customizable specialty templates, integrated lab orders, e-prescribing, clinical decision support, telehealth, patient portal.

PM feature page. Details scheduling with online booking, automated reminders, integrated charge capture from clinical docs, electronic claim submission with scrubbing, ERA posting, denial management, financial analytics.
Interfaces page. Mentions demographics interface, state immunization registry interface, patient history interface. Claims 600+ integrations but doesn't list specific partners.
Company history. Founded 1995 as Lighthouse Medical Management in Providence, RI. Launched CareTracker EMR in 2007. Serves 1,600+ billing company partners. Now headquartered in Niagara Falls, NY.

Patient portal page. Describes secure messaging, health record viewing, online appointment requests, prescription renewal requests, demographic updates, bill viewing and online payments. Included at no extra charge.

Patient engagement page. Describes CareTracker Connect and Connect Pro bundles via InteliChart partnership. Features: online scheduling, digital patient intake, automated notifications (SMS/email/voice), patient surveys.

Constellation Software press release about acquiring CareTracker Inc. (subsidiary of OptumInsight) through Harris Computer in December 2014. Notes it expanded Harris's hospital business (QuadraMed) into ambulatory market.
GlobeNewsWire press release on the CareTracker acquisition by Constellation/Harris. Confirms CareTracker was OptumInsight subsidiary, SaaS platform, same employee group retained in Providence, RI.

Software Finder listing. Pricing: EHR $245/mo per provider, PM $399/mo per provider. Lists features including eRx, EPCS, ETOR, collections module, internal messaging, telehealth. Supported specialties: internal medicine, family practice, GI, pulmonology, orthopedics. User sentiment: billing/RCM strong, interface clunky, support/reliability weak.
Capterra reviews page (403 blocked but search snippets provided). Users praise billing/claims processing and customer training. Complaints about slowness, note corruption, and interface challenges.
Software Advice listing (search result only). Confirms general review presence for Harris CareTracker.
